channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‚ÄòIt‚Äôs a very ugly American trait‚Äô: I cried foul when basic-economy passengers grabbed premium-economy seats. The airline has finally shown me respect.
item.description: ‚ÄúThat woman and her mother were selfish and self-interested, and believed that they were entitled to get those seats.‚Äù

item.title: Trump Media shares surge 55% in premarket trading after assassination attempt
item.description: Trump Media shares surged 50% in premarket trading Monday following the attempted assassination of former President Donald Trump.

item.title: Dow futures rise 200 points after Trump survives assassination attempt: Live updates
item.description: The major benchmarks just came off another solid week as easing inflation data fueled rate-cut bets.

item.title: Why small-caps are the ‚Äòmost compelling investment case‚Äô right now
item.description: The obvious question for investors is whether the burst of interest in small-caps presages a longer up-trend for the sector.

item.title: World leaders condemn assassination attempt on Trump: 'Tragedy for democracy'
item.description: World leaders have joined together to condemn the assassination attempt on former U.S. President Donald Trump at a Pennsylvania rally over the weekend.

item.title: Trump shooting live updates: Trump in Milwaukee for RNC; Biden calls for national unity
item.description: Two people who were shot during the attempted assassination of former President Donald Trump are still in critical but stable condition.

item.title: Are you wealthy, or just rich?¬†Here‚Äôs how to tell, according to financial advisers.
item.description: ‚ÄúI know folks who make seven figures a year ‚Ä¶ but are a couple of missed paychecks away from bankruptcy,‚Äù one financial adviser says.

item.title: Photos show Trump with blood on his face after shots fired at rally
item.description: Trump was removed after loud cracking noises were heard while he was onstage at the Pennsylvania rally.

item.title: Burberry shares drop 15% after the luxury giant issues profit warning and replaces CEO
item.description: Shares in Burberry plunged on Monday morning after a "disappointing" first-quarter performance led it to replace its CEO and axe its dividend.

item.title: ‚ÄòI want to get control of her money‚Äô: My brother left my sister and me $3 million, but she is in hospital with schizophrenia. Will this inheritance be the worst thing for her?
item.description: ‚ÄúAt the moment, we are both in Florida, but the inheritance is in a California probate court.‚Äù

item.title: 'It's sick': Biden condemns violence after Trump injured in shooting at campaign rally
item.description: President Joe Biden, who is running for reelection against Trump, expressed gratitude that Trump is "safe and doing well."

item.title: Trump victory trades to swell after shooting, investors say
item.description: Saturday's shooting at U.S. former President Donald Trump's election rally raises his odds of winning back the White House, and trades betting on his victory will increase this coming week, investors said on Sunday.

item.title: Treasury yields mostly higher as investors assess politics
item.description: Treasury yields mostly rose on Monday as markets shift towards the possibility of a victory for President Donald Trump in November following an apparent assassination attempt.

item.title: Elon Musk endorses Donald Trump shortly after ex-president injured by shots fired at rally
item.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk said he ‚Äúfully‚Äù endorses Trump after the former president was injured when shots were fired at a rally in Pennsylvania.

item.title: Asia markets mostly slip as investors assess China GDP miss and assassination attempt on Trump
item.description: China's economy grew 4.7% in the second quarter, missing expectations of a 5.1% expansion forecast by Reuters and lower than the 5.3% seen in the first quarter.
